review: Chromecast is ok.  I have it hooked up to a TV at work so everyone could stream to it.  Apps have to be compatible with this and there are very few (for me: Netflix, Pandora, and YouTube).  My chrome browser on my desktop computer can't connect to it even though it's on the same network.  You have to run the chromecast app.  Sometimes it won't sync until you close all the media apps.  It's difficult (or next to impossible) to tell what the problem is when it's not syncing.  When it does sync, it's a little slow.  I don't like that it can play my pandora and take over where I wouldn't have control on my device.  No support for Spotify.I know what you're thinking.  All negatives and yet a 3 star.  For $35, being able to stream from your mobile devices to a TV is huge.  I love streaming youtube, pandora, or netflix on the TV.
